effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 399,558 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 184,675.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 575,564, and grants you up to 9,877 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
